member.name: T:LoneWolf.Common.Encryption.Helpers.EncryptionHelper
member.summary: Holds encryption helper methods.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.Encryption.Helpers.EncryptionHelper.GetSHA1Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the SHA1 hash string for the given . The input string is expected to be in UTF8 encoding.
member.param: The string to get the SHA1 hash for.

member.summary: Returns the SHA256 hash string for the given . The input string is expected to be in UTF8 encoding.

member.summary: Encrypts an integer value.
member.param: Integer to encrypt.

The salt to use for the encryption.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.Encryption.Helpers.EncryptionHelper.Encrypt(System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts a string using the default salt value.

Encryption salt

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.Encryption.Helpers.EncryptionHelper.Decrypt``1(System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts an encrypted string to the generic type specified.
member.param: String to decrypt.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.Encryption.Helpers.EncryptionHelper.Decrypt``1(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts an encrypted string to the generic type specified using the specified salt.

The encrypting salt.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.Encryption.Helpers.EncryptionHelper.Decrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts an encrypted string using the specified salt value.

Encryption salt.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.Encryption.Helpers.EncryptionHelper.OldEncrypt``1(``0)
member.summary: DO NOT USE Added for backwards compatibility ONLY (new encrypt/decrypt are not implemented at this time - this is a quick fix ) Encrypts an integer value.
member.param: Integer to encrypt.

member.summary: Encodes a Base64 string.

Optional. The encoding to use. Default is UTF8.

Optional. The encoding to use. Default is UTF8.
